attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition website is unsatisfactory.
Every time I sign an e-petition on this website it takes days, weeks, even months for my signature to be counted once it has been accepted. I see no reason why the counter can't be programmed to increase by +1 instantly as soon as each new signature is accepted. It also seems highly inappropriate to make the people signing the petition type out their details every time they sign a petition instead of being able to store their details or at least copy & paste to save time. The search facility also has considerable room for improvement.
